## selectKeysMap variable

Returns a new map of same type as input only containing given keys (and only if they existed in the original map).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
selectKeysMap: <K, V>(src: Map<K, V>, ks: Iterable<K>) => Map<K, V>
```
